revised_title: Biosynthesis of Porphyrins, Chlorophyll, and Vitamin B: Enzymic Self-Polymerization of Porphobilinogen
tldr: The article discusses the enzymic self-polymerization of porphobilinogen, which gives rise to cyclic tetrapyrroles uroporphyrinogen III and uroporphyrinogen I. The formation of uroporphyrinogen III is catalyzed by a dual enzymic system, porphobilinogen deaminase and uroporphyrinogen III cosynthase. The author explains the different reaction schemes and mechanisms involved in the formation of both uroporphyrinogen isomers.
